title: Research priorities and trends in pulmonary tuberculosis in Latin America: A bibliometric analysis
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Cristian Morán-Mariños, Fabriccio J. Visconti-Lopez, Carlos Espiche, Felix Llanos-Tejada, Renzo Villanueva-Villegas, Renato Casanova-Mendoza, Capriny Bernal-Turpo
